mapper.select: select jb.*,b.username as busername,b.phone as bphone,c.username as cusername,c.phone as cphone,r.username ,r.phone from t_journal_book jb join t_user b on jb.businessId = b.id join t_user c on jb.clientId = c.id left join t_user r on jb.rewardId = r.id where b.id = #{userId} order by jb.journalTime desc limit 0,15
